alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 5:06AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575 affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Etowah River near East Canton Downstream I-575. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the river generally east of Canton. This includes the grassy lot behind a pump station off Riverstone Parkway and near the Interstate 575 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:45 AM EST Friday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
